main event: A series of UFO sightings and strange noises were reported in Lansing, Michigan in May-June 1964.
interesting points: Some witnesses described seeing a large, fast-moving object that seemed to hover and change direction quickly.
One witness reported seeing a blue object 'looping' or 'traveling in loops' accompanied by a strange noise.
The strange noises were later determined to be caused by a new type of siren used by the Lansing police department, which made a 'weird' and 'loud' rising and falling tone.
Other witnesses reported seeing lights in the sky and hearing unusual sounds that they could not explain.
Police received numerous calls from residents reporting the strange sightings and noises.
result: The majority of the reported sightings and noises were explained as being caused by a new police siren, but some of the reports remained unexplained.
sighted object: Bright blue lights, fast-moving objects, hovering objects
photographs: No photographs were included in the report.
